scripts.updateLambdaCodeStaging: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name RossignolGetterStaging --zip-file fileb://lambda.zip --profile hey
scripts.updateLambaEnvStaging: aws lambda update-function-configuration --function-name RossignolGetterStaging --profile hey --environment file://environments/staging.json
scripts.poststaging: npm run removeLambdaZip && npm run updateLambaEnvStaging
